description: It is an online treasure hunt. One or more images describing a word or event has to be connected to find an answer. The website for this event will be live for 3 independent days and the winners will be awarded with cash prizes.
Online Programming Contest will be conducted online with programming questions of various difficulty levels.
round1: The participant has to solve programming questions of various difficult levels in a particular coding platform.
rules: The participant has to appear online for this event. Link will be shared in the website and the whatsapp group.

description: Onsite Programming Contest will be conducted on-premise in the computer laboratories.
round1: Round 1 contains programming based multiple choice questions. Time Duration of this round is 30 minutes. Round 1 happens between 9am to 12pm.
round2: Round 2 is a programming contest consisting of coding problems. This round happens between 2pm to 4pm.

description: System design event tests the system knowledge of the participants though designing a system for the given problem statement.
round1: Given a problem statement or a scenario, participants has to design a complete system. This round happens between 9am and 3pm.
